Text:
Re-uploaded with the missing file included.
Would be great if those who downloaded the previous torrent would make a re-check and continue with this torrent. Sorry for inconvenience. Cheers.

rememer:






































 "You're such a pathetic childish foolish clown. YUK.

It would be nice if you stopped with such comments.

You're very welcome.
Everybody with his own wishes, you don't like it get them somewhere else, I don't force anybody to dl them.
This is how I like them period. I share what I have and like not what other's "wishes" are.

Nobody said a thx, just moaning and moaning, for that I removed it from seedbox and fair well, have fun sharing between your selves....
I seeded over 30 ratio, everyone seems to H&R and forgets to leave a thx or quality related  comment. Ignorant bitches, well, I can be ignorant too.

HighCode, your reaction to my comment was harsh. I didn't mean any disrespect, I was simply expressing my personal disappointment with how you chose to upload this file; just as you like to watch a show in a certain way, so do I.

150 leechers where in obvious disagreement with me.
thanks man i've been waiting for this!

Yeah, merging of episodes is a huge pain for me to add to my XBMC. I am downloading the original Blu-rays and will encode it myself if seeds hold up on BitHQ. Don't know when I will upload them though. You all might very well have to wait till August. I have a lot of other things to upload.
S04 E19-22 has error and will not play...

@eviltrrnt
I tested all files before I made the torrent.
If you couldn't play that particular file you couldn't play any other file because all are encoded with the same settings. 
Also I merged the BD files before I encoded them so no merging issue should occur.
You're very welcome eviltrrnt, I'm so glad you enjoy the free stuff...
I'm sorry, but 81 gigabytes is way too large for four seasons.
I'm sorry, but 81 gigabytes is way too large for four seasons of a show.
Accidentally posted the comment twice...my bad...

Its great to have standardized 1080p for all seasons, thanks for the up
